name: Bros. Together!
description:
A very simple, 2D platformer game, where an AI shows you how to beat the level, giving you the smallest of hints!

"Reminds me of old Flash games!"

Instructions:
- W to jump. (with double jumping.)
- A and D to move left and right.
- The yellow shining circle are collectables which can be collected to get points.
- Have fun. 

Known bugs:
- Movement breaks if the game is laggy. (aka you go faster than usual.)

ENABLE HARDWARE ACCELERATION TO PLAY THE GAME AND ENABLE FULLSCREEN!!! (tested only on Chrome.)

This game was made by:
- Two: https://github.com/real2two
(Game Designer and Project Lead.)

- Brahvim: https://github.com/Brahvim
(Game Engine and Audio Designer.)


We are very proud to tell that this game was made with p5.js! (And their sound technology as well!)

...and most importantly,
Music and SFX credits!: 
- Zapslat (https://www.zapsplat.com/music/gliding-slow-chilled-yet-lightly-pounding-mix-of-...)
- jsfxr
